COMMAND.NAME: execute
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferName The unique name of an e93 buffer.
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Execute the given Tcl script place the results in bufferName if it still exists after the script is finished, otherwise throw them away.
COMMAND.STATUS:
This command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer.
